description: Celosia`s Drapion is a member of Flare Gang and accompanies Celosia on her missions. While attempting to capture the Z-1 Zygarde Squishy, it battled against Pikachu and Scottie`s Grovyle and they managed to stop it from taking Squishy back to Xerosic for further study.
name: Dorapion (Correa)
